channel.title: Sports

item.title: 'We Just F---ing Blew a Chance': Dan Hurley on Missed Opportunity vs. Arizona
item.description: Dan Hurley says he's going to have nightmares because UConn 'just f---ing blew a chance' to beat Arizona.

item.title: Alabama Outlasts Illinois in Chicago To Earn Its 2nd Win Over Top 10 Opponent

item.title: Jimmy Butler, Steve Kerr and the Warriors' quest to solve the Jonathan Kuminga puzzle

item.title: Grading preseason bold predictions for all 32 NHL teams
